items.sentence: What do you think of the way Tom has been behaving lately?
Tom knew that Mary couldn\'t do what she was trying to do.
Tom knew that Mary would never do what she said she\'d do.
Tom kept his gun pointed at Mary and told her not to move.
Tom knew that Mary told everyone she was going to do that.
I can\'t think of any place I\'d rather be than in Boston.
I assume this isn\'t the best time to ask for a promotion.
There was a bowling trophy on the shelf above Tom\'s desk.
I can\'t remember anything about what happened that night.
I can\'t do that with you because I don\'t have any money.
Tom doesn\'t want to sell his house, but he has no choice.
The language they were speaking sounded like French to me.
The last time Tom and Mary went out for dinner, Mary paid.
Tom has been working as a carpenter for about three years.
Tom rolled up the rope and put it in the trunk of his car.
Tom didn\'t understand exactly what Mary wanted him to do.
When do you think that you\'re going to finish doing that?
Tom didn\'t have enough money to buy everything he needed.
Needless to say, we were very tired by the end of the day.
Tom is going to start taking swimming lessons this summer.
I didn\'t realize that Tom didn\'t live in Boston anymore.
Tom hasn\'t come up with a good answer to the problem yet.
The possibility that Tom might be doing that worried Mary.
The problem is that everyone is too scared to talk to Tom.
I just wanted to let you know that I can\'t do that today.
Was Tom able to fill out the application without any help?
There\'s nothing that you can say that\'ll change my mind.
There\'s nothing wrong with admitting that you\'re afraid.
Tom said he was willing to lend us three thousand dollars.
Tom may be rich, but he\'s not as rich as you think he is.
Tom and Mary were in the same class in junior high school.
I can\'t believe it\'s already been a year since Tom left.
What kinds of weapons did the police find in Tom\'s house?
What\'s important now is that you listen to what Tom says.
Are you planning on going to Boston with Tom next weekend?
Are you seriously thinking about giving Tom your computer?
Why did we have to come on this tour? It\'s really boring.
I don\'t ever want to be as irritating as Tom seems to be.
I don\'t think that we\'ll ever know what happened to Tom.
Whenever I hear that song, I think about when I was young.
This is the first time that I\'ve ever disagreed with Tom.
I\'m only going to say this once, so you\'d better listen.
Has it occurred to you that Tom might not want to be here?
What\'s your favorite kind of place to go on a first date?
Some people will never understand why this should be done.
I suggested to Tom the possibility that he work with Mary.
I wondered whether or not Tom thought Mary had to do that.
How difficult was it for you to find a job here in Boston?
I can\'t remember the last time I did something like this.
Tom has recently been diagnosed with rheumatoid arthritis.
